title: Fix production deployment failure by removing non-portable import aliases

requirements.summary: Eliminate the likely production build failure caused by unresolved @/ path aliases, keeping behavior identical and ensuring all existing routes and the Home simulator flow still work after redeploy.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment completes successfully with no deployment errors.
After deployment, the app loads in the browser and the existing routes render (Home, How It Works, Disclaimer, About Us, Contact, Privacy Policy).
The Home page simulator flow still works end-to-end: click "Get Followers" shows the 60-second loading state and then shows exactly one random result message.
No new external API calls are introduced; the simulator logic remains client-side only.

file_operations.description: Replace @/ import aliases (ui components and fakeProcessing) with relative imports so production bundling does not depend on missing path-alias configuration; preserve the existing 60-second simulator flow and UI behavior.
Replace @/ import alias for shadcn/ui Card with a relative import to avoid production build resolution failures; keep rendered content and layout unchanged.
Replace @/ import aliases for shadcn/ui Card and Alert with relative imports to ensure production build succeeds; keep lucide-react usage and page content unchanged.
Replace @/ import alias for shadcn/ui Card with a relative import so the production bundle does not rely on unresolved aliases; keep page copy and structure unchanged.
Replace @/ import alias for shadcn/ui Card with a relative import to prevent production build failures; keep lucide-react icons and links unchanged.
Replace @/ import alias for shadcn/ui Card with a relative import to ensure production build compatibility; keep the policy text and layout unchanged.
Replace @/ import aliases for shadcn/ui Button and Sheet components with relative imports to prevent unresolved alias errors in production builds; preserve navigation behavior and layout.
